name: Pitball: A Celebration of Mr. 305
description:
Dale!

For pinball fans and pitbull fans alike! This digital pinball game will have you flipping your flippers and shaking your hips to the dulcet tunes of Mr. 305! Get as much money as you can before you lose your balls!

Features:
  • Pitcam!: Watch Pitbull dance in real time!
  • Dancing Pitbull DJ Station: Hit this spot to change the Pitbull song that is playing the background
  • Giant Pitbull Head w/ Interactable Nose: Hit Pitbull's nose 5 times to light up all the letters in "MIAMI" and release the special PITBALL - this gives you MORE money!
  • Road Bridge: Get the ball all the way around it to upgrade Pitbull's sweet set of wheels! Coool!
  • Spinning Record: Keep those discs spinning, DJ! Any pinball that falls on this spinning disk will get spun off course!

--------

I made this game 2 years ago, for a class project -- Up until an hour ago, I thought it was lost forever. This game is BUGGY, but it's important to me as it was one of my first big steps on my game dev journey.

I am no longer working on this -- In fact, I lost the project files ages ago, but this zip containing a windows and mac build remain, so here they are. 

I hope you enjoy :)
